data.event: "The village of Kampungu has been quarantined to prevent population movement towards Kananga," Kabila said on Thursday.

event.title: now have 14 experts in DRC, arranged

data.event: MSF, who now have 14 experts in DRC, arranged for eighteen tons of supplies, such as medical and sanitation material, to be delivered to the province of West Kasai.
"In the coming days, we will decide with the Ministry of Health and the WHO whether we set up isolation structures in other locations of the health zone."

event.title: 160 deaths, in DRC in the past few months

data.event: There has been a minimum of 395 people affected by haemorrhagic fever, including 160 deaths, in DRC in the past few months.
